resources.string: Welcome to the UEA Car Locator! This page will give you a quick rundown on how to use this app to find your parked car. Simply follow the steps below:
To mark where your car is parked, stand by your car and tap the first button (with the picture of a car). This will save your current location (via GPS) as the location where the car is parked.

To find your car, tap the second button (with the picture of a map). The route to your car will now be displayed as a line on the map. If you wish to change the directions from the view of a map to a list of text instructions, tap the third button.
If you have the app running while making your way to the car, the app will give you a notification when you are near your destination!
